title: Welcome Ukrainians
sub_head: Whether or not Kamala Harris finds it amusing, she should seize the opportunity to find new Americans.
body:
Today Vice President Kamala Harris may have given the impression that the United States isn’t highly concerned about the plight of Ukrainian refugees. But it’s not too late for her and her boss, President Joe Biden, to seize the opportunity to welcome more of those fleeing warfare to American shores. History says the U.S. will greatly benefit.
As for the vice president, Ms. Harris has a habit of finding amusement where others don’t and today she chose an especially odd occasion to share her mirth.
